text: José Folgado Blanco (1944 - 23 March 2020) was a Spanish businessman and politician. He was a member of the People's Party. Folgado was born Morales de Rey, Spain. Folgado was President of Red Eléctrica de España from 2012 to 2018. He was a Deputy in 2000 and again from 2004 to 2008. From 2007 to 2012, he was Mayor of Tres Cantos. Folgado died on 23 March 2020 of COVID-19 in Tres Cantos at the age of 75.Muere el ex-presidente de Red Eléctrica José Folgado por coronavirus ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Spain Category:Spanish mayors Category:Spanish businesspeople
title: José Folgado
